org.apache.flume.instrumentation

Interface SourceCounterMBean

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KafkaSourceCounter, SourceCounter

    public interface SourceCounterMBean
    This interface represents a source counter mbean. Any class implementing this interface must sub-class MonitoredCounterGroup. This interface might change between minor releases. Please see SourceCounter class.
